name: Galactic Empire
startIntroPart1: The Dark Side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural.
startIntroPart2: Did you ever hear the tragedy off Darth Plagueis the Wise?
declaringWar: Those who do not serve my ends, no matter how powerful they are, will be eliminated.
attacked: This will be the final word in the story of your civilisation !
defeated: I have died before.
introduction: I am Darth Sidious. I am all the Sith !
neutralHello: Everything is going as I planned now.
neutralLetsHearIt: I have been every voice you have ever heard inside your head.
neutralNo: Oh, no, my young Jedi. You will find that it is you who are mistaken, about a great many things.
neutralYes: Your faith in your friends is yours.
hateHello: You’re one man against a galaxy full of scoundrels.
hateLetsHearIt: Are you threatening me ?
hateNo: There is only one plan ! One great design which shall govern the universe ! Mine !
hateYes: The Sith and the Jedi are similar in almost every way, including their quest for greater power.
afterPeace: Your feeble skills are no match for the power of the dark side.
tradeRequest: And if I ever need your services again, I will not hesitate to clone you.
uniques: Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [20] turns.
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [10]

name: Infinite Empire
startIntroPart1: The Rakata are a pestilence upon the galaxy that, to their shame, the Kwa, unleashed.
declaringWar: The Gate is mine to command! I am the Infinite Empire and the galaxy belongs to me!
attacked: You were not the first to challenge me. I have crushed all who opposed me, as I have crushed you… as I will crush these obstacles to my will—the Je'daii!
defeated: By definition, the Infinite Empire cannot fall.
introduction: The Gate is mine to command! I am the Infinite Empire and the galaxy belongs to me!
neutralHello: I am Rakata—it is the name of my people.
neutralLetsHearIt: We are the victors. We do as we like with you.
neutralNo: You suggest both respect and insolence toward your superior in one bold gesture, slave? You learn will.
neutralYes: The Rakata are by nature a cruel and savage species.
hateHello: I am Rakata—it is the name of my people.
hateLetsHearIt: We are the victors. We do as we like with you.
hateNo: You suggest both respect and insolence toward your superior in one bold gesture, slave? You learn will.
hateYes: The Rakata are by nature a cruel and savage species.
afterPeace: Surely you know the glory of the Builders and our Infinite Empire. The fury of our weapons surpass even my own might.
tradeRequest: Surely you know the glory of the Builders and our Infinite Empire. The fury of our weapons surpass even my own might.
uniques: [+1 Production] from every specialist [in all cities]

name: Jedi Order
startIntroPart1: Size matters not. Look at me. Judge me by my size, do you? Hmm? Hmm. And well you should not.
startIntroPart2: For my ally is the Force, and a powerful ally it is. Life creates it, makes it grow. Its energy surrounds us and binds us. Luminous beings are we, not this crude matter. You must feel the Force around you; here, between you, me, the tree, the rock, everywhere, yes. Even between the land and the ship.
declaringWar: Powerful you have become, the dark side I sense in you.
attacked: Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering.
defeated: Into exile I must go. Failed, I have.
introduction: Secret, shall I tell you? Grand Master of Jedi Order am I. Won this job in a raffle I did, think you? 'How did you know, how did you know, Master Yoda?' Master Yoda knows these things. His job it is.
neutralHello: May the force be with you.
neutralLetsHearIt: Do or do not. There is no try.
neutralNo: Darker, the coming storm grows. I fear the dark cloud of the Sith shrouds us all.
neutralYes: Feel the force!
hateHello: There is a disturbance in the Force.
hateLetsHearIt: I fear the dark cloud of the Sith shrouds us all.
hateNo: Once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny. Consume you, it will.
hateYes: Control, control, you must learn control!
afterPeace: Great warrior. Wars not make one great.
tradeRequest: Your path you must decide.
uniqueName: There is no death, there is the Force
uniques: [+1 Faith, +2 Culture] [in all cities] <when not at war>
When defeating a [Land] unit, earn [0] Gold and recruit it <with [20]% chance>

name: Hutt Cartel
startIntroPart1: Rejoice, wretched creatures. Your planet is now the property of the glorious Hutt Cartel.
startIntroPart2: We represent our people. Their honor. Their power. We are the Hutt Council.
declaringWar: Ma bookie, baldo nee anna dodo da eena.
attacked: Coos ka. Jee mo da. Di es paakajidik di Jabba.
defeated: Neek me chowa, wermo, mo killee ma klounkee!
introduction: De wanna wanga, pateesa. Mah pee kasa Jabba.
neutralHello: H'chu apenkee!
neutralLetsHearIt: Hi chuba du naga?
neutralNo: Ma kee chee zay.
neutralYes: Ma bookie, keel-ee calleya ku kah.
hateHello: Jee no waba mu ba outmian nudcha.
hateLetsHearIt: Man-tah.
hateNo: Kee baatu baatu.
hateYes: Mee jewz ju!
afterPeace: Ee ya ba ma dookie massa eek bon chee ko pa na green na meeto do buny dunko la cho ya.
tradeRequest: Niuta, be cotma.
uniques: When conquering an encampment, earn [25] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [67]% chance>

name: Xim's Empire
startIntroPart1: In Eternal Homage to Xim, Whose Fist Shall Enclose the Stars and Whose Name Shall Outlive Time.
declaringWar: This world is mine !
attacked: I'm not the only one who loathed your poetry.
defeated: I did the galaxy a favor.
introduction: Hello, I am Xim the Despote.
neutralHello: Hello.
neutralLetsHearIt: What do you want ?
neutralNo: No.
neutralYes: Yes.
hateHello: Hello.
hateLetsHearIt: What do you want ?
hateNo: No.
hateYes: Yes.
afterPeace: You recognize my superiority.
tradeRequest: I have an offer you can't refuse.

name: Mandalorians
startIntroPart1: Here's why you can't exterminate us, aruetii. We're not huddled in one place—we span the galaxy. We need no lords or leaders—so you can't destroy our command. We can live without technology—so we can fight with our bare hands. We have no species or bloodline—so we can rebuild our ranks with others who want to join us.
startIntroPart2: We're more than just a people or an army, aruetii. We're a culture. We're an idea. And you can't kill ideas—but we can certainly kill you.
declaringWar: I see what you're doing. I see a defense without honor. Let them see what such a defense deserves. Let them burn.
attacked: For my people it's the honor and glory of battle that rules us. It's through combat that we prove our worth, gain renown and make our fortunes.
defeated: It wasn't supposed to end like this.
introduction: There is only one answer — and that answer is the word of Mandalore.
neutralHello: Politics is simply the continuation of war by other means.
neutralLetsHearIt: Politics is simply the continuation of war by other means.
neutralNo: No.
neutralYes: Yes.
hateHello: I'm someone you don't want to get on the bad side of.
hateLetsHearIt: I'm someone you don't want to get on the bad side of.
hateNo: A warrior knows nothing of surrender.
hateYes: I think I need something more than killing and fighting in my life.
uniques: [+50]% Production when constructing [All] units [in all cities]
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
afterPeace: I think I need something more than killing and fighting in my life. I need a purpose or something like that.
tradeRequest: Politics is simply the continuation of war by other means.

name: Sith Order
startIntroPart1: Evil is a word used by the ignorant and the weak. The Dark Side is about survival. It's about unleashing your inner power. It glorifies the strength of the individual.
declaringWar: Peace is a lie. There is only Passion. Through Passion, I gain Strength. Through Strength, I gain Power. Through Power, I gain Victory. Through Victory my chains are Broken. The Force shall free me.
attacked: There will be no truce. There will be no surrender. I don't care how many die. An example will be made of the deserters.
defeated: Life… death… the one is the same as the other.
introduction: The galaxy writhes in chaos and disorder. It requires a man of vision. I am that man of vision. I am the new Emperor.
neutralHello: True power can come only to those who embrace the transformation.
neutralLetsHearIt: Equality is a myth to protect the weak. some of us are strong in the Force, others are not. Only a fool believes otherwise.
neutralNo: Through Power I gain Victory. Through Victory my chains are Broken. The Force shall free me.
neutralYes: Remember why the Sith are more powerful than the Jedi,because we are not afraid to feel.
hateHello: We take what we desire because we can. We can because we have power. We have power because we are Sith.
hateLetsHearIt: Fear attracts the fearful…the strong…the weak…the innocent…the corrupt. Fear. Fear is my ally.
hateNo: To understand the dark side you must suffer through hardship and struggle.
hateYes: If the leader grows weak another must rise to seize the mantle.
afterPeace: I am not a man of words. But I respect the power of words, for that is what transformed me. The words of the Sith Code...
tradeRequest: The strong rule; the weak are meant to serve. This is the way it must be.
uniques: [+20]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>

name: Confederacy of Independent Systems
startIntroPart1: It is an honor to stand before you, for you represent the freedom and the future of our galaxy. The once-great Republic and Jedi Order have become victims of their own ambitions, and the Supreme Chancellor is no more than a pawn of corporate monopolies.
startIntroPart2: As a people you called out for change, you called out for leadership, and I humbly answered that call.
declaringWar: I want only to bring peace and order to the galaxy.
attacked: Brave of you, boy. But I would have thought you had learned your lesson.
defeated: The Sith control everything, you just don't know it.
introduction: I am the Count Dooku of Serenno. I am a political idealist, not a murderer.
neutralHello: I am committed to the idea of a galaxy ruled by an enlightened leader, with laws that apply universally—not one set for the Core Worlds, another for the Outer Rim worlds.
neutralLetsHearIt: What?
neutralNo: No.
neutralYes: Yes.
hateHello: Anger leads to hate and hate leads to power.
hateLetsHearIt: I sense great fear in you. You have hate. You have anger. But you don’t use them.
hateNo: I would kill you right now if I didn't have to drag your body away.
hateYes: Your ideology, while faulty, does have its points.
afterPeace: I don't condone your methods, but you had every right to protect your planet.
tradeRequest: I am a man of great wealth, and I can be very generous to my allies.
uniques: Damage is ignored when determining unit Strength <for [All] units>

name: Alliance to Restore the Republic
startIntroPart1: We, the Rebel Alliance, do therefore in the name—and by the authority—of the free beings of the Galaxy, solemnly publish and declare our intentions:
startIntroPart2: To fight and oppose you and your forces, by any and all means at our disposal; to refuse any Imperial law contrary to the rights of free beings; to bring about your destruction and the destruction of the Galactic Empire; to make forever free all beings in the galaxy. To these ends, we pledge our property, our honor, and our lives.
declaringWar: We agree that the time for diplomacy and politics has passed. It is now time for action… therefore let this be an official declaration of rebellion! Today, we all vow to change the galaxy, and one day the galaxy will indeed be free!
attacked: We have powerful friends. You’re going to regret this.
defeated: You can kill me, but you can't kill what I stand for... and you won't stop justice.
introduction: We are loyalists, trying to preserve democracy in the Republic.
neutralHello: May the Force be with you.
neutralLetsHearIt: What is it? What do you need to tell us?
neutralNo: You're learning the most powerful lesson of all. You're learning how to fall.
neutralYes: I hope one day we can fight together.
hateHello: I feel like because I can fight, I have to, for those who cannot. And I think you might be the same way.
hateLetsHearIt: You target civilians, kill those who surrender, break every rule of engagement!
hateNo: The chancellor has made herself clear. This meeting is over.
hateYes: You have your moments. Not many of them, but you do have them.
afterPeace: War is not a state of being. It is meant to be a temporary chaos between periods of peace. Some want it to be the course of things: a default fact of existence. But I will not let that be so.
tradeRequest: This is Mon Mothma. I have an assignment for you. The Rebellion needs you and we don't have much time. We must work together.
uniques: [+20]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
[-50]% unhappiness from the number of cities

name: Yuuzhan Vong Empire
startIntroPart1: This is not about your little planet. We will take your whole galaxy. We will destroy your machines; they are an abomination.
startIntroPart2: We will share our ways, we will share our beliefs. We will share pain, like us, you will come to embrace it.
declaringWar: It is not your galaxy. You have merely infested it for a time. We have come to end the infection, in the name of glorious Yun-Yuuzhan. Tchurokk Yun'tchilat!
attacked: We shall teach you the glory of the gods. Do-ro'ik vong pratte!
defeated: Al' tanna Shimrra knotte Yun'o!
introduction: Long life to Shimrra, beloved of the gods!
neutralHello: Qe'u.
neutralLetsHearIt: Bos sos si?
neutralNo: Puul.
neutralYes: Rrush'hok ichnar vinim'hok!
hateHello: You will learn the glory of the Praetorite Vong.
hateLetsHearIt: Bos?
hateNo: Yadag dakl, ignot!
hateYes: Dwi.
afterPeace: Welcome my home. You see my home, I be-bel-believe. You come me there. I show you splendor Yuuzhan Vong.
tradeRequest: Welcome my home. You see my home, I be-bel-believe. You come me there. I show you splendor Yuuzhan Vong.
uniques: City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
Cities are razed [2] times as fast

name: Eternal Empire of Zakuul
startIntroPart1: Look around you. Zakuul is poised to become the greatest civilization in the history of the galaxy.
startIntroPart2: I have forged this empire to surmount all of my previous works. To span eternity.
declaringWar: I see futures in you. Futures I will not allow. Your future ends here.
attacked: You presume limits to my power. There are none.
defeated: My life spans millennia. Legions have risen to test me… My ascendance is inevitable. A day, a year, a millennium—it matters not. I hold the patience of stone and the will of stars. Your striving is insignificant. Let your death be the same.
introduction: Look around you. Zakuul is poised to become the greatest civilization in the history of the galaxy. I have forged this empire to surmount all of my previous works. To span eternity.
neutralHello: Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul.
neutralLetsHearIt: Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul.
neutralNo: Rules are for people who lack the creativity to break them.
neutralYes: Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul.
hateHello: I am the wrath of the dragon's fire. I am your Eternal Emperor.
hateLetsHearIt: I am the wrath of the dragon's fire. I am your Eternal Emperor.
hateNo: The deaths you've caused. The war you've fueled. It is all mine. This galaxy is mine. It's time I claimed it once more.
hateYes: Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul.
afterPeace: These petty conflicts mean nothing. The concerns of this galaxy are meaningless. Once I ascend, all will be tranquil in this galaxy. It is my promise to you.
tradeRequest: You are mine. Servants. Slaves. Weapons. And you will obey…

name: Chiss Ascendancy
startIntroPart1: The Chiss must be approached from a position of strength and respect.
startIntroPart2: One must have strength, for the Chiss will deal only with those capable of keeping their promises. One must have respect, for the Chiss must believe that those promises will be kept.
declaringWar: Those who cannot keep up will be left behind, to watch from a distance. And those who stand in our way will not watch at all.
attacked: No warrior ever has the full depth of control that he would like. But I wish here that it might have been otherwise.
defeated: But… it was so artistically done.
introduction: My name is Mitth'raw'nuruodo but you can call me Thrawn.
neutralHello: Learn about art. When you understand a species' art, you understand that species.
neutralLetsHearIt: One can concentrate so closely on the words of a sentence that one thereby misses the meaning. As can happen in any area of life. You must never lose focus on the larger landscape.
neutralNo: We Chiss are accustomed to formulating our own policies.
neutralYes: One can concentrate so closely on the words of a sentence that one thereby misses the meaning. As can happen in any area of life. You must never lose focus on the larger landscape.
hateHello: No warrior ever has the full depth of control that he would like. But I wish here that it might have been otherwise.
hateLetsHearIt: Anyone can make an error. But that error doesn't become a mistake until you refuse to correct it.
hateNo: The Chiss do not simply accept alien concepts without careful consideration. We certainly do not submit to domination. By anyone.
hateYes: Anyone can make an error. But that error doesn't become a mistake until you refuse to correct it.
afterPeace: We haven't been defeated. Merely slowed down a bit.
tradeRequest: There's a degree of risk involved. But risk has always been an inescapable part of warfare. In this case, the potential benefits far outweigh the potential dangers.
uniques: Great General provides double combat bonus

name: Hapes Consortium
startIntroPart1: The Hapes Cluster was originally settled by pirates, a group called the Lorell Raiders.
startIntroPart2: For hundreds of years they stalked the trade routes, seizing ships, stealing cargo. And when they found a beautiful woman, some raider would take her as a prize to the hidden worlds of Hapes.
declaringWar: True to our pirate roots, the Hapans prefer swift, ruthless strikes. Hurt an enemy at the start of an engagement and he is yours, for as the fight progresses, his fear of you will intensify and will become your ally.
attacked: The raiders were your kind of people. The Hapans will put the fear into those warships.
defeated: Hapes can only be as strong as those who lead her.
introduction: Greetings from the esteemed Queen Mother of the Hapes Consortium.
neutralHello: Greetings from the esteemed Queen Mother of the Hapes Consortium.
neutralLetsHearIt: Greetings from the esteemed Queen Mother of the Hapes Consortium.
neutralNo: No.
neutralYes: Yes.
hateHello: No man can rule Hapes.
hateLetsHearIt: No man can rule Hapes.
hateNo: Never let a man become so deluded as to believe that he is the intellectual equal of a woman. It only leads him to evil.
hateYes: You should see what the queen mothers have built over the centuries: Their cities are beautiful, stately, serene. But it's not just the homes or factories, it's their people, their ideals.
afterPeace: Hapes can only be as strong as those who lead her.
tradeRequest: Greetings from the esteemed Queen Mother of the Hapes Consortium.

name: Corporate Sector Authority
startIntroPart1: The Corporate Sector wasn't always what it is today. Back in the old days it was simply a place where businesses could go and make a few credits without too many bureaucrats getting into the act. As an enterprising businessman, I can appreciate that kind of setup.
startIntroPart2: That was back when the Republic was something to be respected, and the businesses were kept on a tight leash. But things changed…
declaringWar: CSA attorneys can find a loophole even when there isn't a loop.
attacked: The Corporate Sector is completely by the book, and when they feel they are right, according to that book, there is no stopping them.
defeated: Goodbye.
introduction: Hello.
neutralHello: Hello.
neutralLetsHearIt: Speak.
neutralNo: The Corporate Sector is completely by the book, and when they feel they are right, according to that book, there is no stopping them.
neutralYes: Yes.
hateHello: Hello.
hateLetsHearIt: CSA attorneys can find a loophole even when there isn't a loop.
hateNo: It's an insult to have one of those eyesores in the Corporate Sector Authority.
hateYes: Yes.
afterPeace: Thanks.
tradeRequest: Listen.

name: Trade Federation of Planets
startIntroPart1: I believe in the idea of the Trade Federation. When the Republic fails to recognize your homeworld as anything but an asset in shipping and commerce, you become a commodity. And a statistic. I'll not let my life be a line item in a shipping manifest.
startIntroPart2: With the Trade Federation, Neimoidians finally have a voice. History shows the Republic barely acknowledged our existence until the Trade Federation.
declaringWar: You had better live through this! I want my money!
attacked: You have to understand what these sectors were like before the Trade Federation arrived. And if it were made to leave? Then there'd be no law at all.
defeated: The war is over! Lord Sidious promised us peace! We only want...
introduction: I am a man of great wealth, and I can be very generous to my allies.
neutralHello: I am a man of great wealth, and I can be very generous to my allies.
neutralLetsHearIt: I am a man of great wealth, and I can be very generous to my allies.
neutralNo: What? What did you say?
neutralYes: I am a man of great wealth, and I can be very generous to my allies.
hateHello: This is getting out of hand! Now, there are two of them!
hateLetsHearIt: This is getting out of hand! Now, there are two of them!
hateNo: This is outrageous! I object to your statements.
hateYes: I never risk my own skin if I don't have to.
afterPeace: I never risk my own skin if I don't have to.
tradeRequest: You will sign it, or you will suffer.
uniques: City-State territory always counts as friendly territory

name: Techno Union
startIntroPart1: He is the Separatists' Techno Union Foreman, as well as a combat engineer. A brilliant strategist.
startIntroPart2: And extremely dangerous—an expert at fighting machines, and a master of defense technologies. He is also an expert at escape.
declaringWar: It appears a surrender is unnecessary. You will all perish for the glory of the Techno Union.
attacked: You'll pay for this.
defeated: Please, I'll give you anything. Anything you want!
introduction: The Techno Union army is at your disposal.
neutralHello: The Techno Union army is at your disposal.
neutralLetsHearIt: The Techno Union army is at your disposal.
neutralNo: No.
neutralYes: Very good. The funds have been forwarded to your account.
hateHello: Perhaps we can come to a compromise.
hateLetsHearIt: Perhaps we can come to a compromise.
hateNo: I have not lost yet
hateYes: Very good. The funds have been forwarded to your account.
afterPeace: Perhaps we can come to a compromise.
tradeRequest: With these new Battle Droids we've built for you, you'll have the finest army in the galaxy.
uniques: Gain [35] Influence with a [Military] gift to a City-State
[+50]% Production when constructing [All] units [in all cities]

name: Black Sun
startIntroPart1: It is a vast criminal syndicate…its influence felt on every planet from the Core Worlds to the Outer Rim. Black Sun has existed for hundreds of years, and embedded itself in the very fiber of the galaxy.
startIntroPart2: The resources at its disposal are almost limitless. The soldiers under its command number in the tens of thousands. The ignorant even call it the most powerful force in the known universe.
declaringWar: You see, to contend with Xizor is to lose.
attacked: It'll be your funeral.
defeated: If you cannot afford to lose, you should not play the game.
introduction: Prince Xizor of House Sizhran. Black Sun captain.
neutralHello: Hello.
neutralLetsHearIt: Speak.
neutralNo: We're a crime syndicate, hardly a force to rally with.
neutralYes: I bowed and responded to your every request. You couldn't have found a more amenable business partner.
hateHello: Hello.
hateLetsHearIt: Speak.
hateNo: Everyone hates Black Sun.
hateYes: After careful consideration, we will join you.
afterPeace: Every atom of my being is at your command.
tradeRequest: Congratulations. You have come to the attention of Black Sun.
uniques: City-State territory always counts as friendly territory

name: Commerce Guild
startIntroPart1: On the ruins of the old, decrepit Republic those of us with foresight will build a new political structure, perfect and gleaming.
startIntroPart2: One without any weak links, free of the moralistic waste that encumbers and slows the appropriate development of a truly advanced society.
declaringWar: Impatience is a potentially fatal disease.
attacked: Impatience is a potentially fatal disease.
defeated: We were promised a reward, a h-h-handsome reward—
introduction: We, the Commerce Guild, are always eager to take advantage of shifting political realities.
neutralHello: Hello.
neutralLetsHearIt: Speak.
neutralNo: What you are proposing could be construed as treason.
neutralYes: We, the Commerce Guild, are always eager to take advantage of shifting political realities.
hateHello: Hello.
hateLetsHearIt: Speak.
hateNo: What you are proposing could be construed as treason.
hateYes: We, the Commerce Guild, are always eager to take advantage of shifting political realities.
afterPeace: I have all of our best interests at heart.
tradeRequest: I have all of our best interests at heart.

name: InterGalactic Banking Clan
startIntroPart1: May there be prosperity and stability in all our lands! May our people be free and safe! Long live the banks!
declaringWar: The safety of our clients investment is always our paramount concern.
attacked: Mercy, I beg you. I am merely a banker.
defeated: You're…
introduction: The safety of our clients investment is always our paramount concern.
neutralHello: The safety of our clients investment is always our paramount concern.
neutralLetsHearIt: The safety of our clients investment is always our paramount concern.
neutralNo: The safety of our clients investment is always our paramount concern.
neutralYes: The InterGalactic Banking Clan will support you wholeheartedly. But only in a nonexclusive arrangement
hateHello: The safety of our clients investment is always our paramount concern.
hateLetsHearIt: The safety of our clients investment is always our paramount concern.
hateNo: The safety of our clients investment is always our paramount concern.
hateYes: The Banking Clan will sign your treaty.
afterPeace: The Banking Clan will sign your treaty.
tradeRequest: May there be prosperity and stability in all our lands!
uniques: Gain [90] Influence with a [Great Person] gift to a City-State

name: Corporate Alliance
startIntroPart1: The Corporate Alliance controls everything!
declaringWar: We will do all we can to protect our assets and intellectual properties.
attacked: We will do all we can to protect our assets and intellectual properties.
defeated: Please, try to calm yourself. Here, take your tea.
introduction: The Corporate Alliance controls everything!
neutralHello: Always at your service. Always.
neutralLetsHearIt: Always at your service. Always.
neutralNo: Patience. These preparations must be completed with utmost precision. You do not want this grand endeavor to fail, not when we are so close to victory.
neutralYes: I am authorized by the Corporate Alliance to sign the treaty.
hateHello: Always at your service. Always.
hateLetsHearIt: Always at your service. Always.
hateNo: We will do all we can to protect our assets and intellectual properties.
hateYes: I am authorized by the Corporate Alliance to sign the treaty.
afterPeace: I am authorized by the Corporate Alliance to sign the treaty.
tradeRequest: Always at your service. Always.
uniques: When declaring friendship, both parties gain a [10]% boost to great person generation

name: Pyke Syndicate
startIntroPart1: A powerful part of the spice cartel. Their criminal activities had allowed them to almost completely control the production of raw spice, used to create a powerful drug.
declaringWar: Open the bank. We're here for a withdrawal.
attacked: Did you honestly think you'd get away with fooling a Pyke?
introduction: Underworld's a small community. I have no desire to oppose you. We come to join you.
neutralHello: Hello.
neutralLetsHearIt: Speak.
neutralNo: No.
neutralYes: Yes.
hateHello: Hello.
hateLetsHearIt: Speak.
hateNo: No.
hateYes: Yes.
afterPeace: If you follow me, I'm sure we can reach a… mutually beneficial arrangement.
tradeRequest: If you follow me, I'm sure we can reach a… mutually beneficial arrangement.
uniques: City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate

name: Zann Consortium
startIntroPart1: I am Tyber Zann. Corruption is my weapon. And while the galaxy is distracted by civil war, I will strike.
declaringWar: The Zann Consortium shall rule!
attacked: The Zann Consortium shall rule!
defeated: My stay in prison has not done wonders for the Consortium.
introduction: I am Tyber Zann. Corruption is my weapon.
neutralHello: I am in complete control, that's the way I like it.
neutralLetsHearIt: I am in complete control, that's the way I like it.
neutralNo: Time is money.
neutralYes: Everyone has a price.
hateHello: I am in complete control, that's the way I like it.
hateLetsHearIt: I am in complete control, that's the way I like it.
hateNo: Time is money.
hateYes: Everyone has a price.

City-State territory always counts as friendly territory

name: Zygerrian Slave Empire
startIntroPart1: Zygerrians, you say? No stranger to them am I. Thrived on Outer Rim slave trade for centuries did the Zygerrian civilization. Moved from system to system, abducting primitive beings for profit—even into the systems of the Republic.
startIntroPart2: When ordered to cease, resist did the Zygerrians. Crushed their empire of bondage did the Jedi.
declaringWar: My queen is going to bring back the royal slave auction as in the days before the Jedi. Zygerria will be rich and powerful again.
attacked: For thousands of years, Zygerria has provided slave labor to the galaxy. We prospered. Our customers have prospered. Then you arrived.
defeated: You were right. I am a slave, just as you are.
introduction: Slavery is the natural order of things. The weak deserve nothing more than to kneel before the strong, bound to our service.
neutralHello: Zygerria will be rich and powerful again.
neutralLetsHearIt: Zygerria will be rich and powerful again.
neutralNo: No.
neutralYes: yes.
hateHello: Slavery is the natural order of things.
hateLetsHearIt: Slavery is the natural order of things.
hateNo: No.
hateYes: yes.
afterPeace: Zygerria will be rich and powerful again.
tradeRequest: Slavery is the natural order of things.

name: Duskhan League
startIntroPart1: Our claim to these stars is natural and ancient. Our eyes have owned them since the beginning of our days. They are alive in our legends. They call to us in our dreams. We draw our strength from the All. The purity of the All inspires us to perfection.
startIntroPart2: Our claim to these stars is not a shallow thing of greed, or politics, or ambition. It is not a claim we would ever surrender.
declaringWar: Soon I shall join my people. Soon the Yevetha shall be no more. But we shall not go down quietly.
attacked: You have never faced an adversary like us. Your wars are decided by the death of a tenth of a population, a third of an army. Then the defeated surrender their honor and the victors surrender their advantage. This is called being civilized. The Yevetha are not civilized, General. It would be a mistake to deal with us as though we were.
defeated: Because you would become our obsession, for as many years as it took to destroy you.
introduction: We draw our strength from the All. The purity of the All inspires us to perfection.
neutralHello: The Yevetha are not civilized. It would be a mistake to deal with us as though we were.
neutralLetsHearIt: The Yevetha are not civilized. It would be a mistake to deal with us as though we were.
neutralNo: You are vermin.
neutralYes: Is it not invigorating, to see how much power has passed into the hands of the Blessed? Can any doubt that we are the children of the All, the inheritors of the ancient glory? How far shall that glory carry us, my young disciple? How much shall we claim with our ambition?
hateHello: Our claim to these stars is natural and ancient. Our eyes have owned them since the beginning of our days.
hateLetsHearIt: Our claim to these stars is natural and ancient. Our eyes have owned them since the beginning of our days.
hateNo: You are vermin.
hateYes: We draw our strength from the All. The purity of the All inspires us to perfection.
afterPeace: We Yevetha are skilled in matters of making. It is a gift of our very being. These hands are sure. These minds learn quickly.
tradeRequest: We Yevetha are skilled in matters of making. It is a gift of our very being. These hands are sure. These minds learn quickly.
uniques: Cities are razed [2] times as fast

name: Gree Enclave
startIntroPart1: I know you're familiar with the ancient Rakata Infinite Empire. These people predate them by eons.
startIntroPart2: Even though the Gree have been gone for millennia, technology that old might as well be ten thousand years ahead of us instead of ten thousand behind. It's obscure. Arcane. Not to be touched.
declaringWar: Grey pentachoron.
attacked: Green perpendicular.
defeated: Blue nonagon.
introduction: Orange tangent.
neutralHello: Orange sphere.
neutralLetsHearIt: White vertex.
neutralNo: Yellow concave.
neutralYes: Blue tangent.
hateHello: Orange sphere.
hateLetsHearIt: White vertex.
hateNo: Yellow concave.
hateYes: Blue tangent.
afterPeace: Purple shift.
tradeRequest: Purple vertex.
uniques: Receive a tech boost when scientific buildings/wonders are built in capital
[+100]% unhappiness from the number of cities

name: Kolkpravis
startIntroPart1: Jedi! You are surrounded, your army is decimated. Make peace with the Force now…for this is your final hour. But know that I, General Grievous, am not completely without mercy. I will grant you a warrior's death. Prepare!
declaringWar: Your skills are impressive. Perhaps a match for my own.
attacked: You think you can defeat me? You’re nothing.
defeated: Time to abandon ship.
introduction: I am Qymaen jai Sheelal, warlord of the Kaleesh.
neutralHello: I expected someone with your reputation to be a little... older.
neutralLetsHearIt: I expected someone with your reputation to be a little... older.
neutralNo: I wield great power, fool!
neutralYes: I expected someone with your reputation to be a little... older.
hateHello: You are a bold one.
hateLetsHearIt: You are a bold one.
hateNo: Your lightsabers will make a fine addition to my collection!
hateYes: That wasn’t much of a rescue.
afterPeace: Army or not, you must realize, you are doomed.
tradeRequest: You are a bold one.
uniques: [+100]% unhappiness from the number of cities
Great General provides double combat bonus

name: Spiverelda
startIntroPart1: Turn back now. Retreat while you can, for I am your doom.
declaringWar: My personal strategy for victory is through total annihilation.
attacked: Turn back now. Retreat while you can, for I am your doom.
defeated: Your nobility--
introduction: I am the Admiral Trench. My personal strategy for victory is through total annihilation.
neutralHello: My personal strategy for victory is through total annihilation.
neutralLetsHearIt: My personal strategy for victory is through total annihilation.
neutralNo: The Aqualish people are not fond of questions.
neutralYes: I have won this round.
hateHello: I smell fear, and it smells good.
hateLetsHearIt: I smell fear, and it smells good.
hateNo: The Aqualish people are not fond of questions.
hateYes: I have won this round.
afterPeace: Our orders are to blockade, not chase. I have won this round.
tradeRequest: You are a bold one.

name: The Colony
startIntroPart1: The Killiks are tied to the history of the galaxy in a way we don't understand yet. They were living in cities before humans learned to build, and they were a civilization before the Sith were spawned. They were here when Centerpoint and the Maw were constructed-and they were driven from Alderaan by the beings who did it.
declaringWar: We have heard about this new Force of yours, and we despair. You have grown blind to the dark side itself.
attacked: We have heard about this new Force of yours, and we despair. You have grown blind to the dark side itself.
defeated: The Colony is our home.
introduction: We learned to care for the infirm. Before, only the nest mattered. But Yoggoy is smart. Yoggoy learned the value of the individual, and Yoggoy grew stronger. The Unu was created.
neutralHello: The Kind seek only to live in harmony with the Song of the Universe.
neutralLetsHearIt: The Kind seek only to live in harmony with the Song of the Universe.
neutralNo: You have grown blind to the dark side itself.
neutralYes: The Kind seek only to live in harmony with the Song of the Universe.
hateHello: You have grown blind to the dark side itself.
hateLetsHearIt: You have grown blind to the dark side itself.
hateNo: You have grown blind to the dark side itself.
hateYes: The Kind seek only to live in harmony with the Song of the Universe.
afterPeace: The Kind seek only to live in harmony with the Song of the Universe.
tradeRequest: The Kind seek only to live in harmony with the Song of the Universe.
uniques: [-50]% unhappiness from the number of cities

name: Corellian Confederation
startIntroPart1: I know that. I don’t like it, but I can see it. Could see it the day Palpatine and Darth Vader died. All over. But Palpatine’s New Order, the Imperial system—that we can bring back, at least here. Just no Emperor over the Diktat. No one telling the Corellian Sector what to do. In-de-pen-dent. Just us here, putting the aliens back in their place.
declaringWar: The Confederation will do what barbarians always do - divide the spoils.
attacked: My allegiance is to the Corellian system alone. And you'd be smart to curb that lightsaber tongue of yours. An insult to the man is an insult to the office.
defeated: You were always the one who liked to play games. And I was always the one who had to come in and clean up after you.
introduction: My allegiance is to the Corellian system alone.
neutralHello: My allegiance is to the Corellian system alone.
neutralLetsHearIt: My allegiance is to the Corellian system alone.
neutralNo: My allegiance is to the Corellian system alone.
neutralYes: The Confederation will do what barbarians always do - divide the spoils.
hateHello: An insult to the man is an insult to the office.
hateLetsHearIt: An insult to the man is an insult to the office.
hateNo: An insult to the man is an insult to the office.
hateYes: The Confederation will do what barbarians always do - divide the spoils.
afterPeace: The Confederation will do what barbarians always do - divide the spoils.
tradeRequest: The Confederation will do what barbarians always do - divide the spoils.
uniques: [-50]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]

name: Crimson Dawn
startIntroPart1: The Sith took everything from me. Ripped me from my mother's arms, murdered my brother, used me as a weapon and then cast me aside. Abandoned me. Once, I had power, now I have nothing. Nothing.
declaringWar: Silence! You think you know me? It was I who languished for years thinking of nothing but you! Nothing but this moment! And now, the perfect tool for my vengeance is in front of us. I never planned on killing you, but I will make you share my pain.
attacked: You may have forgotten me, but I will never forget you. You cannot imagine the depths I would go to to stay alive, fueled by my singular hatred, for you.
defeated: I was apprentice to the most powerful being in the galaxy once. I was destined to become… so much more. But I was robbed of that destiny by you.
introduction: Fear. Fear attracts the fearful… the strong… the weak… the innocent… the corrupt. Fear. Fear is my ally.
neutralHello: Fear. Fear attracts the fearful… the strong… the weak… the innocent… the corrupt. Fear. Fear is my ally.
neutralLetsHearIt: Fear. Fear attracts the fearful… the strong… the weak… the innocent… the corrupt. Fear. Fear is my ally.
neutralNo: You are but one small piece moving in this mechanism which I have designed, and yet, when you falter, it jeopardizes everything.
neutralYes: You and I will be working much more closely from now on.
hateHello: Fear. Fear attracts the fearful… the strong… the weak… the innocent… the corrupt. Fear. Fear is my ally.
hateLetsHearIt: Fear. Fear attracts the fearful… the strong… the weak… the innocent… the corrupt. Fear. Fear is my ally.
hateNo: To continue, we need one singular vision…my vision.
hateYes: At last, the great deceiver comes to rescue his pawn.
afterPeace: Our futures converge on a planet with two suns. We can walk that path together as friends, as brothers.
tradeRequest: Our futures converge on a planet with two suns. We can walk that path together as friends, as brothers.
